SETS.LaTeX: \text{Let } i \in \{X, Y, Z\} \text{ represent the types of goods.}

VARIABLES.name: y_X
VARIABLES.description: Binary variable indicating whether GoodsX is produced (1) or not (0)

VARIABLES.name: y_Y
VARIABLES.description: Binary variable indicating whether GoodsY is produced (1) or not (0)

VARIABLES.name: y_Z
VARIABLES.description: Binary variable indicating whether GoodsZ is produced (1) or not (0)

PARAMETERS.name: p_CostX
PARAMETERS.description: Initial cost per truck for GoodsX

PARAMETERS.name: p_CostY
PARAMETERS.description: Initial cost per truck for GoodsY

PARAMETERS.name: p_CostZ
PARAMETERS.description: Initial cost per truck for GoodsZ

PARAMETERS.name: p_ReductionX
PARAMETERS.description: Reduction in cost per $100 invested in optimization for GoodsX

PARAMETERS.name: p_ReductionY
PARAMETERS.description: Reduction in cost per $100 invested in optimization for GoodsY

PARAMETERS.name: p_ReductionZ
PARAMETERS.description: Reduction in cost per $100 invested in optimization for GoodsZ

PARAMETERS.name: p_TotalReduction
PARAMETERS.description: Total cost reduction required for GoodsZ

PARAMETERS.name: p_TotalCostReduction
PARAMETERS.description: Combined cost reduction for GoodsX, GoodsY, and GoodsZ must be positive

PARAMETERS.name: p_InvestmentConstraint
PARAMETERS.description: Total investment in optimization does not exceed the total cost savings from using the software

OBJECTIVE.query: Minimize the total delivery cost for all goods.
OBJECTIVE.LaTeX: \min z_{TotalCost} = C_X x_X + C_Y x_Y + C_Z x_Z - z_Optimization \cdot (R_X y_X + R_Y y_Y + R_Z y_Z)
